Tavernites!<br /><br />I may have just talked myself into running a one shot DW game for new players.<br /><br />Going to take along 8 playbooks.<br /><br />Do I go basic only or further afield?<br /><br />Hit me up with a list of your fave 8
<div id='comment z13pjzth0lehe1zm023zjfipaxzxddpku'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/116013665970125878211_photo.jpg'> Yochai Gal</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-07-15 18:48:28 (edited: 2018-07-15 18:48:28)</cite></p>
        <p>I would be remiss if I did not at the least mention my hack of DW, One Shot World. It&#39;s free, and you can mine it for useful resources.<br /><a href="http://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/242339/One-Shot-World-Beta" data-embed="" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">http://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/242339/One-Shot-World-Beta</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13pjzth0lehe1zm023zjfipaxzxddpku'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/110792987733044259815_photo.jpg'> Charles Eichman</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-07-16 12:05:34 (edited: 2018-07-16 12:05:34)</cite></p>
        <p>Definitely the big four (F, T, C, MU). After that Ranger, Bard, Barbarian. Druid, too, if you don&#39;t mind the constant shapeshifting in order to circumvent obstacles (flying over chasms; mousing into a room to spy; goin&#39; gator in the swamp, and so on).</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13pjzth0lehe1zm023zjfipaxzxddpku'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102664254666078826277_photo.jpg'> Stephen Karnes</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-07-17 15:57:34 (edited: 2018-07-17 15:57:34)</cite></p>
        <p>I would definitely recommend sticking with the core classes and omitting the Druid. I also like to level my characters up very early on in one shots so they get a taste of the advanced moves.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13pjzth0lehe1zm023zjfipaxzxddpku'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/111339504073837053815_photo.jpg'> Ross “Hawklord2112” Kingston</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-07-20 18:11:34 (edited: 2018-07-20 18:11:34)</cite></p>
        <p>thanks all.. going with the revised core classes (Fighter, thief, wizard, cleric, bard, paladin, ranger, druid, barbarian and Immolator) plus<br />The Charred<br />The Dashing Hero<br />The Artificer<br /><br />and starting at level 2<br /><br />thanks for all the input!</p>
</div>
